member.name: T:Id3.InfoFx.FrameTypes
member.summary: Collection of ID3 frame types.

member.name: T:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProvider
member.summary: Represents the base class for info providers.

member.name: M:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProvider.GetTagInfo
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the tag details.

member.name: M:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProvider.GetProperties
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the properties of the info provider.

member.name: M:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProvider.MeetsInputCriteria
member.summary: Indicates whether the inputs meets the criteria for the info provider.
member.returns: true if the inputs meet the criteria.

member.name: M:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProvider.FramesMeetCriteria(Id3.Id3Tag,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Type})
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified ID3 has the specified frames.
member.param: The ID3 frame types that the tag must contain.
member.returns: true if the tag has all the specified frames.

member.name: T:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderAttribute
member.summary:
Attribute used to specify the classes in the assembly.
Useful as a discovery mechanism for info providers.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderAttribute.ProviderType
member.summary: The type of the info provider.

member.name: T:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderInputs
member.summary:
The inputs to the info provider.
Depending on the specific info provider, none or more of the input properties specified in this class will be needed. Read the info provider's documentation for more details or use the info provider's property to understand the required inputs.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderInputs.Tag
member.summary: An instance that acts as an input.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderInputs.FileName
member.summary: The file name that acts as an input.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderInputs.Mp3Stream
member.summary: The MP3 stream data that acts as an input.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderInputs.Properties
member.summary: Additional properties that may be needed by certain info providers.

member.name: T:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties
member.summary: Details of an info provider.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties.Name
member.summary: Descriptive name for the info provider.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties.Url
member.summary: URL containing details of the info provider. Could be a home page.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties.RegistrationUrl
member.summary: URL to a registration page, if the info provider service needs credentials to be used.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties.RequiredInputs
member.summary: Types of ID3 frames that are required for the info provider.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties.OptionalInputs
member.summary: Types of ID3 frames that can be used but are not required for the info provider.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties.AvailableOutputs
member.summary: Types of ID3 frames that are output by the info provider.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties.CanOmitTag
member.summary: Indicates whether the info provider requires the tag instance to work.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties.RequiresFilename
member.summary: Indicates whether the info provider needs a MP3 file name to work.

member.name: P:Id3.InfoFx.InfoProviderProperties.RequiresStream
member.summary: Indicates whether the info provider needs a MP3 stream to work.
